definition: deviating from what is considered moral or right or proper or good, a person without moral scruples, reject (documents) as invalid
details:
adjective
- deviating from what is considered moral or right or proper or good
= synonyms: depraved
noun
- a person without moral scruples
= synonyms: miscreant
verb
- reject (documents) as invalid
- express strong disapproval of
= synonyms: decry, excoriate, objurgate, deprecate, condemn, reprehend, deplore
- abandon to eternal damnation
= example: abandon to eternal damnation
